CustomField.formula: IF(Approval_level__c = 0 || Final_Unit_Price__c = Approved_Unit_Price__c , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "0",15,15), IF(Approval_level__c >= 1, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "1",15,15),'')&' '& IF(Approval_level__c >= 2, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "2",15,15),'')& ' '& IF(Approval_level__c >= 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "3",15,15),'') )
CustomField.label: Approval Level Indicator
